title: Now every other game is a remake.....ive spent more time in queue than playing
body: This is going to get old fast riot. wait 15 minutes to get into a game for it to last 5 minutes....

replies.body: Riot will adjust the system as data on how it is working is collected.
that means every other game has had an afk for the first 3 mins of the game...idk how accurate that is
you mean to say you've finally realized that every other game is actually trash and it in fact it really wasn't "gg" at the end?
